name: PythonOp
description: The PythonOp class represents a Python operator in TouchDesigner, providing access to Python script execution and operator-specific functionality.

members.name: module
members.description: The Python module object associated with this operator

members.name: isDAT
members.description: Boolean indicating if this is a DAT operator

members.name: isCOMP
members.description: Boolean indicating if this is a COMP operator

members.name: extensions
members.description: List of extension classes attached to this operator

methods.name: run
methods.description: Execute the Python script in this operator

parameters.name: *args
parameters.description: Positional arguments to pass to the script

parameters.name: **kwargs
parameters.description: Keyword arguments to pass to the script

methods.name: call
methods.description: Call a specific function within the Python operator

parameters.name: function_name
parameters.description: Name of the function to call

parameters.name: *args
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the function

parameters.name: **kwargs
parameters.description: Keyword arguments to pass to the function

methods.name: addExtension
methods.description: Add an extension class to this operator

methods.name: removeExtension
methods.description: Remove an extension class from this operator

methods.name: addCallback
methods.description: Register a callback function for a specific event

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event name to register for
